statements: UPDATE airports SET runway_length = 3500.25, airport_name = 'New York Airport' WHERE airport_id = 1;
UPDATE airports SET facilities = 'WiFi, Restaurants, Shops' WHERE airport_name = 'Los Angeles Airport';
UPDATE airports SET runway_length=3000.50, facilities='Parking, Restaurant, Lounge' WHERE airport_id=5;
UPDATE airports SET facilities='Shopping, Duty Free, Cafeteria', runway_length=3500.75 WHERE airport_id=3;
UPDATE airports SET runway_length = 10000 WHERE airport_id = 1;
UPDATE runways SET runway_length = 8000, runway_name = 'Main Runway' WHERE runway_id = 3;
UPDATE airports SET runway_length = 8000 WHERE airport_id = 1;
UPDATE runways SET runway_length = 9000, runway_name = 'Long Runway' WHERE airport_id = 1;
UPDATE AirportInformation SET runway_length = 8000 WHERE airport_code = 'JFK';
UPDATE PilotsInformation SET airport_code = 'LAX' WHERE pilot_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE AirportInformation SET runway_length = 15000.75 WHERE airport_code = 'JFK';
UPDATE PilotsInformation SET pilot_license = 'Commercial' WHERE pilot_id = 101;
UPDATE airports SET city='New City' WHERE airport_id=1;
UPDATE facilities SET facility_name='Updated Facility' WHERE airport_id=2;
UPDATE airports SET city='New City' WHERE airport_id=1;
UPDATE runways SET runway_length=3000 WHERE airport_id=2;
UPDATE airports SET runway_length = 8000 WHERE airport_id = 1;
UPDATE runways SET runway_length = 9000, runway_name = 'Main Runway' WHERE runway_id = 2;

UPDATE runways SET runway_length = 10000, airport_id = 3, runway_name = 'Main Runway' WHERE runway_id = 2
